We are Apla

A tech company that uses distributed ledger technology to help organizations work faster, safer and with greater impact.

Technological advantage as a service: the Apla blockchain platformTM. It’s secure, scalable and easy to use

Cybersecurity on a new level

Technological security of the highest spec.

Flexible access rights

This is Alpa’s key advantage: a multi-level system for access rights management to data, interfaces and smart contracts, allowing for full control of how the applications work.

Rapid application development

Where others require half a year to develop a working application, our system can be created and implemented within a couple of weeks.

Fast transactions

A maximum output capacity and potential boost to performance speed of up to 10,000 times, which corresponds to fintech and IT industry standards.

User-friendly

Apla’s software client differs from competitors’ in its intuitive interface for interaction with the platform. Getting to grips with it literally is a piece of cake! The clients’ needs are also adapted to depending on how different devices work, taking into account individual characteristics and requirements.

Your very own blockchain department

Apla offers not just a platform, but full operational support throughout. We offer an optimal solution and take care of the complete operation cycle: from research and development to implementation of innovative solutions and personnel training.

Blockchain is a technology of efficiency

Secure your data

Complex cryptography keeps data safe. Entries are replicated and stored on several servers. Information cannot be lost and cannot be falsified.

Reduce maintenance costs

Traditional document transfers and circulation has come to its end, and out goes all of the related financial and time expenditure with it. All operations are executed instantaneously, transparently and automatically.

Embrace innovation

A well-selected and implemented set of blockchain solutions naturally lifts an organization to a new level of development, with additional competitive advantage.

What our clients say?

Niyi Ayoola-Daniels

President
International Institute for Petroleum, Energy Law and Policy, Nigeria

As a solution designed specifically for government, Apla offers unparalleled scalability and strategic implementation across different verticals. Identifying key government sectors and focusing on high-impact areas like education, the Apla team brings to the table an understanding of economic opportunities that blockchain adoption can unlock globally.

Dr. Fernando Wangila

Deputy Director (Head of ICT and Innovation)
National Transport and Safety Authority, Kenya

Apla is a unique platform with rapid application development capabilities that allow organizations to adopt blockchain in record time. What's interesting is the transition from government applications to a government ecosystem model.

Top-management

Oleg
Strelenko

Founder
Blockchain visionary, strong believer and creator of Apla’s unique technology.
Blockchain visionary, strong believer and creator of Apla’s unique technology. EAn early adopter of blockchain, Oleg created his own decentralized electronic currency DCoin in 2011. As he completed 73,000 lines Go code and attracted investors, he realized the future potential is much bigger. In 2016 Oleg launched eGaaS (electronic Government as a Service) and became one of the pioneers of ICO market. This work was crucial for the Apla project and built a solid foundation for the current progress.

Michael
Aprossine

Chief Business Development Officer
Michael is a blockchain evangelist and a serial entrepreneur.
Michael is a blockchain evangelist and a serial entrepreneur with more than 20 years’ experience in IT. Extensive industry knowledge and the desire to shake things up compelled Michael to launch a number of online startups from dotcoms to the internet of things and blockchain. An expert in strategic planning and new business model incorporation, Michael is developing Apla partnership programs and attracting customers around the world. He holds an Executive MBA and is a bachelor of Social Science. Worked as a co-founder and CEO of USDC SlotLogic S.A.R.L., as a marketing director at Korston Group, as BDO at FTS Maconomy and Ciscom.

Vitaly
Bondar

Chief Executive Officer
Vitaly is an expert in legal regulation of blockchain, fintech and private international law.
Vitaly is an expert in legal regulation of blockchain, fintech and private international law. He is a Chief Legal Officer of Apla and a CEO of the Luxembourg-based law firm ChristmannSchmitt. Over the past 15 years, he has held senior positions at large international law firms and industrial companies with a focus on cross-border mergers and acquisitions, and transaction structuring. Vitaly holds an LL.M. (Legum Magister) degree in International Banking and Commercial Law after receiving advanced study at Queen Mary University in London.

Muhammed
Arafath

Executive Director MENA
An outstanding expert in blockchain implementation and keynote speaker on a global scale.
An outstanding expert in digital transformation, Apla’s Executive Director and key speaker on a global scale. As a speaker or chair, he often attends the events like the Gartner Symposium/ITxpo, TRESCON and the World Blockchain Summit. A graduate from Southern Cross University (Australia), Muhammed is a certified Blockchain business analyst, and has over 10+ years of experience working with diverse industries and international markets. Не is actively working with governmentals and businesses to help them adopt blockchain. Advisor of the World Blockchain Foundation, former principal consultant at Finesse Global (Dubai), and business analyst at Quosphere and UXL Consulting.

Advisory board

Evgeni
Agronic

Head of Google Marketing Solutions (Russia)
An outstanding IT professional with a passion for building new businesses.
An outstanding IT professional with a passion for building new businesses. He brings a vast knowledge base which is driving Apla’s organizational performance to the top. At Google, Evgeni is responsible for sales, B2B Marketing, and customer experience for a wide range of clients. He has been leading sales teams and growing revenue in Africa, Israel, Turkey, and the Middle East. Evgeni is also a mentor at the startup accelerator, GTI Labs, and holds an MBA in Business Administration and Management.

Konstantin
Goldshtein

Senior System Analyst at Microsoft
Technology evangelist, business coach and consultant with vast experience.
Technology evangelist, business coach and consultant with more than 15 years of experience in the IT industry of Israel, the USA and Europe. Developed and promoted products used by companies from the Fortune 500 list. Created ISV — a program focussed on acceleration of startups and developers. Over the last two years, Konstantin has been focused on the examination and expansion of business developing cloud-based solutions.

Ioannis
Karamitsos

Digital Transformation Technologist & Managing Consultant at Orange (UAE)
A technology expert with over two decades’ experience in IT and over 30 technical papers published.
Ioannis is an expert in cybersecurity, cryptography, blockchain, smart contracts, SDN/DC, machine learning and internet of things. He is certified in security, cloud computing, data center, and IT governance, and has 23 years of experience in IT. Also, Ioannis was managing complicated smart cities projects in Europe and the Middle East. During his career he built many products ranging from embedded low-level systems to complex systems for telecoms networks. Author of over 30 papers and technical reports and a member of IEEE since 1997.

Chris
Bruck

Chief Marketing Officer of eGaaS S.A., Luxembourg
An entrepreneur with 30 years’ experience marketing cutting edge technology.
An entrepreneur with 30 years’ experience marketing cutting edge technology worldwide. Co-founded the first European web portal Europe Online in 1994, received strategic, financial, marketing and operational experience in Europe, Japan, and the US for major players and startups. Improved the Rolex brand impact online 2000% (2005-2008). Founder of Bespeak fashion technology start-up, former CEO of “Ashes and Snow” concept art project with more than 10 million visitors to date. Completed a Ph.D. and M.A. in Business and Commerce at Keio University, Tokyo, and a Juris Doctor at the University of Paris I., Panthéon-Sorbonne. Fluent in 5 languages, including Japanese.

Apla to hold blockchain hackathon in partnership with Gazprom and others

Apla is to hold the AplaBlockchainHack contest in Moscow over the weekend, welcoming blockchain aficionados to take part in a hackathon with total prize fund of 1.5 million RUB ($26,000) to be won.

How to Integrate Blockchain into Work Processes?

When embarking on this discovery phase, the first question to ask should be: “is blockchain needed at all?” This is, of course, assuming that the fundamental question of “what is a blockchain” is already understood.
